original_text: He fled with all that he had and arose and crossed the Euphrates, and set his face toward the hill country of Gilead.
korean_text: 그가 그의 모든 소유를 이끌고 강을 건너 길르앗 산을 향하여 도망한 지

sentences.original_text: He fled with all that he had
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 가진 모든 것을 가지고 도망쳤다

sentences.original_text: and set his face toward the hill country of Gilead
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 길르앗 산지를 향해 얼굴을 돌렸다
